mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER ( LOGID, ITEM, ERROR, IP, CREATEDATE, USERID, USERNAME ) VALUES ( #{logid}, #{item}, #{error}, #{ip}, now(), #{userid}, #{username} )
mapper.select:
SELECT LOGID logid, ITEM item, ERROR error, IP ip, CREATEDATE createdate, USERID userid, USERNAME username FROM SYS_ERROR_LOG
AND ITEM LIKE '%'||#{item}||'%'
AND ip LIKE #{item}||'%'
AND CREATEDATE>=str_to_date(#{createdatebegin},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND CREATEDATE<=str_to_date(#{createdateend},'%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY CREATEDATE DESC
